verbs.description: In response to the [ARG0: Trump] - [V: created] [ARG1: controversy] over NFL players protesting during the national anthem , the National Football League on Wednesday announced a new policy that essentially bans players from kneeling during the anthem , violating their constitutional right of freedom of speech .
